name: Sticky McFlash
description:
A fun little game about a stick person named Sticky McFlash

Controls:

Arrow Keys to Move

Z to Boost

X to Jump

Controller compatible (except menus)

Sound effects from shiru8bit:

https://www.patreon.com/shiru8bit
